column4: Hey guys.  I have wlan0.  I want to make wlan0 and wlan1.  I have NO IDEA what I should be googling.  Any suggestions?
via vlan0 and vlan1 you talking about having 2 wireless cards?
edbian I want to duplicate the interface.  I'm pretty sure I did it years ago.  For example, to put one into monitor mode and to have one connect to an AP, using the same device
